name: Democracy Manifest Soundboard
description:
___________________________________________

This is Democracy Manifest  the Soundboard!

___________________________________________

The classic Australian icon comes to you featuring 15 classic lines from Mr Democracy Manifest himself. 

Golden quotes of Democracy Manifest at your finger tips. 

___________________________________________

Get it now on Android, Windows & MacOS!

___________________________________________

Be sure to check out the other apps and games Thunderous Wizard Studios has to offer! Follow Thunderous Wizard Studios on Itch.io to keep up to date with all the new apps and games coming soon!

_

*Donations on Itch will go to the developer for future app and game development*
